meanings.definition: A person who sails on iceboats.
meanings.sent1: The iceboaters glided gracefully across the frozen lake.
meanings.sent2: We watched the iceboaters zooming by on their sleek vessels.
meanings.sent3: The iceboaters looked like they were dancing on the ice.
meanings.sent4: The iceboaters were like swans on the frozen water.
meanings.sent5: The colorful jackets of the iceboaters stood out against the white ice.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who participate in iceboating.
meanings.sent1: The iceboaters gathered at the shore before setting off together.
meanings.sent2: We could hear the laughter and chatter of the iceboaters from afar.
meanings.sent3: The iceboaters formed a cheerful community on the frozen lake.
meanings.sent4: The iceboaters moved in unison like a flock of birds.
meanings.sent5: The group of iceboaters created a vibrant scene on the icy expanse.

meanings.definition: To engage in the activity of iceboating.
meanings.sent1: We decided to iceboat across the lake for some winter fun.
meanings.sent2: They planned to iceboat on the weekend to enjoy the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: Let's iceboat our way to the other side of the frozen pond!
meanings.sent4: The friends iceboated together, laughing all the way.
meanings.sent5: Iceboating under the clear blue sky was a thrilling experience.
